00028 /* ranging state: idle (free for ranging requests) */
00029 #define RANGING_IDLE                0
00030 
00031 /* ranging state: running
00032  * Blocks other ranging requests until timeout or successfull completed ranging)
00033  */
00034 #define RANGING_RUNNING     1
00035 
00036 /* protocol for ranging register values */
00037 #define PHASEOFFSETACK      0
00038 #define TOAOFFSETMEANACK_L  1
00039 #define TOAOFFSETMEANACK_H  2
00040 #define TXRESPTIME_L        3
00041 #define TXRESPTIME_H        4
00042 #define PHASEOFFSETDATA     5
00043 #define TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_L 6
00044 #define TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_H 7
00045 #define RANGING_ERROR       8
00046 #define COUNTER             9
00047 #define ACTTXID             10
00048 
00049 /* length of ranging register values */
00050 #define RANGING_DATA_LEN    11
00051 
00052 /* speed of our signal in AIR or CABLE [um/ps] */
00053 #define SPEED_OF_AIR 299.792458
00054 
00055 /* max difference between remote und local measurement
00056  * - if the difference is > MAX_DIFF_ALLOWED ranging fails */
00057 #define MAX_DIFF_ALLOWED 10
00058 
00059 extern MsgT upMsg; /**< for sending packets to upper layer => phy.c */
00060 extern MsgT *txSendMsg; /**< pointer to store last transmitted message. => phy.c */
00061 extern PhyModeSetT modeSet; /**< selects the right ranging const and timeout */
00062 extern callbackfn_t phySendMsgUp; /**< used to send msg to upper layer => phy.c */
00063 
00064 /* ranging type whichs able to store all information for one p2p ranging */
00065 typedef struct
00066 {
00067     uint8_t lrv[RANGING_DATA_LEN]; /**< local ranging values */
00068     uint8_t rrv[RANGING_DATA_LEN]; /**< remote ranging values */
00069     uint8_t set1[RANGING_DATA_LEN]; /**< this holds collected data for calculation */
00070     uint8_t set2[RANGING_DATA_LEN]; /**< this holds collected data for calculation */
00071     uint8_t errors; /**< this stores occuring errors during ranging */
00072     AddrT addr; /**< address of remote ranging station */
00073     uint8_t state; /**< local state of ranging process */
00074 } RangingT;
00075 
00076 static RangingMsgT rangingMSG; /**< used to communicate with upper layer */
00077 static RangingT rangingMEM; /**< local ranging memory for 3W_A & 3W_B */
00078 static RangingT *prMEM; /**< pointer to ranging memory */
00079 
00080 //static MsgT downRngMsg;  /**< for sending packets over air */
00081 static MsgT recBuffer; /**< buffers recently recieved msg */
00082 
00083 /* function pointer in upper layer, called only on remote ranging requests
00084  * and is used to decline/accept ranging requests */
00085 static permissionfn_t rangingPermission;
00086 
00087 /* function pointer in upper layer, called on local or remote ranging requests
00088  * and only if 2W_PP ranging is chosen. Is used to gather memory
00089  * from application to store ranging informations */
00090 static mem_assignfn_t rangingGetMemory;
00091 
00092 /* counter for occured timeouts */
00093 static uint16_t to_cnt_down = 0;
00094 /* modulo of timeout time */
00095 static uint16_t to_mod = 0;
00096 /* flag which cancel running timeout */
00097 static bool_t to_stop = FALSE;

00136  * @param p2 is one set of register values

00139  */
00140 static double dist(uint8_t *p1, uint8_t *p2);

00154 /***************************************************************************/
00155 bool_t NTRXRangingIsIDLE(void)
00156 /***************************************************************************/
00157 {
00158     if (prMEM == NULL) return TRUE;
00159 
00160     if (prMEM->state == RANGING_IDLE) return TRUE;
00161 
00162     return FALSE;
00163 }
00164 
00165 /***************************************************************************/
00166 void NTRXRangingInit()
00167 /***************************************************************************/
00168 {
00169     ntrxShadowReg[NA_BbTimerIrqEnable_O] |= (uint8_t)( 1 << NA_BbTimerIrqEnable_B );
00170     NTRXSPIWriteByte( NA_BbTimerIrqEnable_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_BbTimerIrqEnable_O] );
00171 
00172     prMEM = &rangingMEM;
00173     prMEM->state = RANGING_IDLE;
00174 }
00175 
00176 /***************************************************************************/
00177 void NTRXRangingRequest(MsgT *msg)
00178 /***************************************************************************/
00179 {
00180     /* transmitter still busy? */
00181     if (txSendMsg != NULL)
00182     {
00183         RANGING_DEBUG("req. - tx busy\n");
00184         msg->prim = PD_RANGING_CONFIRM;
00185         msg->status = PHY_BUSY_TX;
00186         memcpy(msg->data, (uint8_t*) &rangingMSG, sizeof(RangingMsgT));
00187         msg->len = sizeof(rangingMSG);
00188         msg->pdu = msg->data;
00189         SendMsgUp (msg);
00190         return;
00191     }
00192 
00193     /* only start a new ranging process if no ranging is allready running */
00194     if (prMEM->state != RANGING_IDLE)
00195     {
00196         RANGING_DEBUG("req. - phy busy\n");
00197         msg->prim = PD_RANGING_CONFIRM;
00198         msg->status = PHY_BUSY;
00199         memcpy(msg->data, (uint8_t*) &rangingMSG, sizeof(RangingMsgT));
00200         msg->len = sizeof(rangingMSG);
00201         msg->pdu = msg->data;
00202         SendMsgUp (msg);
00203         return;
00204     }
00205 
00206     switch (msg->attribute)
00207     {
00208         default: /* attribute not known, report error */
00209             {
00210                 RANGING_DEBUG("req. - unsupported attribute\n");
00211                 msg->prim = PD_RANGING_CONFIRM;
00212                 msg->status = PHY_UNSUPPORTED_ATTRIBUTE;
00213                 memcpy(msg->data, (uint8_t*) &rangingMSG, sizeof(RangingMsgT));
00214                 msg->len = sizeof(rangingMSG);
00215                 msg->pdu = msg->data;
00216                 SendMsgUp (msg);
00217                 return;
00218             }
00219             break;
00220 
00221         case RANGING_TYPE_3W_A :
00222             {
00223                 /* use internal memory for A */
00224                 prMEM = &rangingMEM;
00225                 /* reset counter if target address changed */
00226                 //prMEM->lrv[COUNTER] = 0;
00227                 prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] = RG_STAT_DEFAULT;
00228             }
00229             break;
00230 
00231         case RANGING_TYPE_3W_B : /* use internal memory for B */
00232             {
00233                 /* use internal memory for B */
00234                 prMEM = &rangingMEM;
00235                 /* reset counter if target address changed */
00236                 //prMEM->lrv[COUNTER] = 0;
00237                 prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] = RG_STAT_DEFAULT;
00238             }
00239             break;
00240 
00241         case RANGING_TYPE_2W_PP :
00242             {
00243                 /* try to get memory from upper Layer */
00244     #ifdef RANGE_GET_MEMORY_WORKAROUND
00245                 prMEM = &rangingMEM;
00246     #else
00247                 if (rangingGetMemory == NULL)
00248                 {
00249                     RANGING_DEBUG("req. - fp not set\n");
00250 
00251                     /* get memory failed, report error to upper layer */
00252                     msg->prim = PD_RANGING_CONFIRM;
00253                     msg->status = PHY_FP_NOT_SET;
00254                     memcpy(msg->data, (uint8_t*) &rangingMSG, sizeof(RangingMsgT));
00255                     msg->len = sizeof(rangingMSG);
00256                     msg->pdu = msg->data;
00257                     SendMsgUp (msg);
00258                     return;
00259                 }
00260 
00261                 /* TODO get memory from upper Layer */
00262                 prMEM = (RangingT*) (*rangingGetMemory)(sizeof(RangingT), msg->addr);
00263                 RANGING_DEBUG("TX prMEM = %p (%d)\n", prMEM, (uint16_t) sizeof(RangingT));
00264     #endif
00265                 if (prMEM == NULL)
00266                 {
00267                     RANGING_DEBUG("req. - no memory\n");
00268 
00269                     /* get memory failed, report error to upper layer */
00270                     msg->prim = PD_RANGING_CONFIRM;
00271                     msg->status = PHY_NO_MEMORY;
00272                     memcpy(msg->data, (uint8_t*) &rangingMSG, sizeof(RangingMsgT));
00273                     msg->len = sizeof(rangingMSG);
00274                     msg->pdu = msg->data;
00275                     SendMsgUp (msg);
00276                     return;
00277                 }
00278 #if 0
00279                 if (memcmp(prMEM->addr, msg->addr, sizeof(AddrT)) != 0)
00280                 {
00281                     /* reset counter if target address changed */
00282                     prMEM->lrv[COUNTER] = 0;
00283                 }
00284 #endif
00285                 if (memcmp(prMEM->addr, msg->addr, sizeof(AddrT)) != 0)
00286                 {
00287                     prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] = RG_STAT_DEFAULT;
00288                 }
00289 
00290             }
00291             break;
00292     }
00293 
00294     /* start new ranging */
00295     if (msg->len > 0)
00296     {
00297         /* handle user data */
00298         if (msg->len > CONFIG_MAX_PACKET_SIZE - RANGING_DATA_LEN)
00299         {
00300             RANGING_DEBUG("req. - overflow\n");
00301 
00302             /* to much user data, return error */
00303             msg->prim = PD_RANGING_CONFIRM;
00304             msg->status = PHY_USER_DATA_OVERFLOW;
00305             memcpy(msg->data, (uint8_t*) &rangingMSG, sizeof(RangingMsgT));
00306             msg->len = sizeof(rangingMSG);
00307             msg->pdu = msg->data;
00308             SendMsgUp (msg);
00309             return;
00310         }
00311 
00312         /* move userdata to userdata space */
00313         memcpy(msg->data + RANGING_DATA_LEN + RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN, msg->data, msg->len);
00314     }
00315 
00316 //  prMEM->errors = STAT_NO_ERROR;
00317 #if 0
00318     printf("prMEM->lrv[COUNTER] == %d\n", prMEM->lrv[COUNTER]);
00319     if (prMEM->lrv[COUNTER] == 0)
00320     {
00321         printf("request: reset lrv + rrv\n");
00322         memset(prMEM->lrv, 0, sizeof(prMEM->lrv));
00323         memset(prMEM->rrv, 0, sizeof(prMEM->rrv));
00324         /* reset error flags */
00325         prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] = RG_STAT_DEFAULT;
00326     }
00327 #endif
00328     /* state of ranging cycle set to begin */
00329     prMEM->lrv[ACTTXID] = 0;
00330     /* copy destination address */
00331     memcpy(prMEM->addr, msg->addr, sizeof(AddrT));
00332     /* copy rangingprotocol into datafield */
00333     msg->data[0] = msg->attribute;
00334     memcpy(msg->data + RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN, prMEM->lrv, RANGING_DATA_LEN);
00335     msg->len += RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN + RANGING_DATA_LEN;
00336 
00337     /* set local state to running */
00338     prMEM->state = RANGING_RUNNING;
00339 
00340     /* attribute is used to identify ranging or datapacket */
00341     msg->attribute = MSG_TYPE_RANGING;
00342 
00343     RANGING_DEBUG("req. - send down\n");
00344 
00345     /* send ranging packet */
00346     NTRXSendPacket(msg);
00347 
00348     /* count every tx packet */
00349     //prMEM->lrv[COUNTER]++;
00350 }
00351 
00352 /***************************************************************************/
00353 void NTRXRangingACK(void)
00354 /***************************************************************************/
00355 {
00356     MsgT *tMsg;
00357 
00358     switch (txSendMsg->data[0])
00359     {
00360         default: /* attribute not known, report error */
00361             {
00362                 return;
00363             }
00364             break;
00365 
00366         case RANGING_TYPE_3W_A : /* use internal memory for A */
00367             {
00368 
00369                 RANGING_DEBUG("ack(%d) 3W_A - %s\n", (uint16_t) prMEM->lrv[ACTTXID],
00370                                         txSendMsg->status == PHY_SUCCESS? "success": "no ack");
00371 
00372                 switch(prMEM->lrv[ACTTXID])
00373                 {
00374                     case 0 :
00375 
00376                         if (txSendMsg->status == PHY_SUCCESS)
00377                         {
00378                             /* read ranging values from chip */
00379                             NTRXReadRegisterACK();
00380 
00381                             //NTRXStartBbTimer(modeSet.rangingTimeout);
00382                             NTRXStartTimeout(RANGING_TIMEOUT);
00383                         }
00384                         else /* PHY_NO_ACK */
00385                         {
00386                             /* no ack recieved, cancel ranging process */
00387                             prMEM->state = RANGING_IDLE;
00388 
00389                             /* set error */
00390                             //prMEM->errors |= STAT_NO_REMOTE_STATION;
00391                             //prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] |= STAT_NO_REMOTE_STATION;
00392                         }
00393 
00394                         /* copy local valus in up message */
00395                         rangingMSG.error = (uint8_t)(prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] | prMEM->rrv[RANGING_ERROR]);
00396                         memcpy(rangingMSG.addr, prMEM->addr, sizeof(AddrT));
00397 
00398                         /* copy into payload */
00399                         memcpy(txSendMsg->data, &rangingMSG, sizeof(RangingMsgT));
00400 
00401                         /* call callbackfuntion to inform the user */
00402                         txSendMsg->prim = PD_RANGING_CONFIRM;
00403                         txSendMsg->attribute = RANGING_TYPE_3W_A;
00404 
00405                         /* send up */
00406                         tMsg = txSendMsg;
00407                         txSendMsg = NULL;
00408                         tMsg->pdu = tMsg->data;
00409                         SendMsgUp (tMsg);
00410 
00411                         break;
00412                     case 1 :
00413                         if (txSendMsg->status == PHY_SUCCESS)
00414                         {
00415                             /* read ranging values from chip */
00416                             NTRXReadRegisterACK();
00417                         }
00418                         else /* PHY_NO_ACK */
00419                         {
00420                             /* set error */
00421                             //prMEM->errors |= STAT_NO_ANSWER1;
00422                             //prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] |= STAT_NO_ANSWER1;
00423                         }
00424 
00425                         /* dont send msg up, but release storage */
00426                         txSendMsg = NULL;
00427 
00428                         /* new state of ranging process */
00429                         prMEM->lrv[ACTTXID] = 2;
00430 
00431                         /* generate second answer packet */
00432                         upMsg.prim = PD_RANGING_REQUEST;
00433 
00434                         /* copy rangingprotocol into datafield */
00435                         upMsg.data[0] = RANGING_TYPE_3W_A;
00436                         memcpy(upMsg.data + RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN, prMEM->lrv, RANGING_DATA_LEN);
00437                         memcpy(upMsg.addr, prMEM->addr, sizeof(AddrT));
00438                         upMsg.len = RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN + RANGING_DATA_LEN;
00439                         /* attribute is used to identify ranging or datapacket */
00440                         upMsg.attribute = MSG_TYPE_RANGING;
00441 
00442                         /* send ranging packet */
00443                         NTRXSendPacket(&upMsg);
00444 
00445                         break;
00446                     case 2 :
00447                         /* ranging done, stop timeout */
00448                         NTRXStopTimeout();
00449 
00450                         /* ranging finish, set state to IDLE */
00451                         prMEM->state = RANGING_IDLE;
00452 
00453                         /* dont send msg up, but release storage */
00454                         txSendMsg = NULL;
00455 
00456 #if 0
00457                         /* check if the last packet contains user data */
00458                         if (recBuffer.len > RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN + RANGING_DATA_LEN)
00459                         {
00460                             /* give only user payload to upper layer */
00461                             upMsg.prim = PD_DATA_INDICATION;
00462                             memcpy(upMsg.addr, recBuffer.addr, sizeof(AddrT));
00463                             upMsg.len = (uint8_t)(recBuffer.len - RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN - RANGING_DATA_LEN);
00464                             RANGING_DEBUG("rx - userdata (%d bytes)\n", (uint16_t) upMsg.len);
00465                             memcpy(upMsg.data, recBuffer.data + RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN + RANGING_DATA_LEN, upMsg.len);
00466                             upMsg.pdu = upMsg.data;
00467                             SendMsgUp(&upMsg);
00468                         }
00469 #endif
00470 
00471                         break;
00472                 }
00473             }
00474             break;
00475 
00476         case RANGING_TYPE_3W_B : /* use internal memory for B */
00477             {
00478                 RANGING_DEBUG("ack(%d) 3W_B - %s\n", (uint16_t) prMEM->lrv[ACTTXID],
00479                                         txSendMsg->status == PHY_SUCCESS? "success": "no ack");
00480 
00481                 switch(prMEM->lrv[ACTTXID])
00482                 {
00483                     case 0 :
00484 
00485                         if (txSendMsg->status == PHY_SUCCESS)
00486                         {
00487                             /* read ranging values from chip */
00488                             NTRXReadRegisterACK();
00489 
00490                             //NTRXStartBbTimer(modeSet.rangingTimeout);
00491                             NTRXStartTimeout(RANGING_TIMEOUT);
00492                         }
00493                         else /* PHY_NO_ACK */
00494                         {
00495                             /* no ack recieved, cancel ranging process */
00496                             prMEM->state = RANGING_IDLE;
00497 
00498                             /* set error */
00499                             //prMEM->errors |= STAT_NO_REMOTE_STATION;
00500                             //prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] |= STAT_NO_REMOTE_STATION;
00501                         }
00502 
00503                         /* copy local valus in up message */
00504                         //rangingMSG.error = prMEM->errors;
00505                         rangingMSG.error = (uint8_t)(prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] | prMEM->rrv[RANGING_ERROR]);
00506                         rangingMSG.distance = 0;
00507                         memcpy(rangingMSG.addr, prMEM->addr, sizeof(AddrT));
00508 
00509                         /* copy into payload */
00510                         memcpy(txSendMsg->data, &rangingMSG, sizeof(RangingMsgT));
00511 
00512                         /* call callbackfuntion to inform the user */
00513                         txSendMsg->prim = PD_RANGING_CONFIRM;
00514                         txSendMsg->attribute = RANGING_TYPE_3W_B;
00515 
00516                         /* send up */
00517                         tMsg = txSendMsg;
00518                         txSendMsg = NULL;
00519                         tMsg->pdu = tMsg->data;
00520                         SendMsgUp (tMsg);
00521 
00522                         break;
00523                     case 1 :
00524 
00525                         if (txSendMsg->status == PHY_SUCCESS)
00526                         {
00527                             /* read ranging values from chip */
00528                             NTRXReadRegisterACK();
00529                         }
00530                         else /* PHY_NO_ACK */
00531                         {
00532                             /* set error */
00533                             //prMEM->errors |= STAT_NO_ANSWER1;
00534                             //prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] |= STAT_NO_ANSWER1;
00535                         }
00536 
00537                         /* dont send msg up, but release storage */
00538                         txSendMsg = NULL;
00539                         break;
00540 
00541                     case 2 :
00542                         /* ranging done, stop timeout */
00543                         NTRXStopTimeout();
00544 
00545                         /* ranging finish, set state to IDLE */
00546                         prMEM->state = RANGING_IDLE;
00547 
00548                         /* dont send msg up, but release storage */
00549                         txSendMsg = NULL;
00550                         break;
00551                 }
00552             }
00553             break;
00554 
00555         case RANGING_TYPE_2W_PP : /* try to get memory from upper Layer */
00556             {
00557                 //memset(prMEM->lrv, 0, 8); /* reset only ranging data */
00558                 //memset(prMEM->rrv, 0, 8); /* reset only ranging data */
00559 
00560                 RANGING_DEBUG("ack(%d) 2W_PP - %s\n", (uint16_t) prMEM->lrv[ACTTXID],
00561                                         txSendMsg->status == PHY_SUCCESS? "success": "no ack");
00562 
00563                 switch(prMEM->lrv[ACTTXID])
00564                 {
00565                     case 0 :
00566                         /******** ** *******/
00567                         /******** T1 *******/
00568                         /******** ** *******/
00569 
00570 /* WARNING: cbo: Reset error flags only if a ranging is started, not in anycase. CHECK THIS!!! */
00571                         /* reset error flags */
00572                         //prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] = RG_STAT_DEFAULT;
00573 
00574                         if (txSendMsg->status == PHY_SUCCESS)
00575                         {
00576                             /* reset error flags only on successfull started ranging */
00577                             prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] = RG_STAT_DEFAULT;
00578 
00579                             /* read ranging values from chip */
00580                             NTRXReadRegisterACK();
00581

00623

00637                         txSendMsg = NULL;
00638                         tMsg->pdu = tMsg->data;
00639                         SendMsgUp (tMsg);
00640 #endif
00641 
00642                     break;
00643                 }
00644             }
00645             break;
00646     }
00647 }
00648 
00649 /***************************************************************************/
00650 void NTRXRangingRX(MsgT *msg)
00651 /***************************************************************************/
00652 {
00653 #if 0
00654     /* check if the packet contains user data */
00655     if (msg->len > RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN + RANGING_DATA_LEN)
00656     {
00657         /* give only user payload to upper layer */
00658         upMsg.prim = PD_DATA_INDICATION;
00659         memcpy(upMsg.addr, msg->addr, sizeof(AddrT));

00666 #endif
00667 
00668     /* buffer recieved data and call the callback functions after sending answers */
00669     memcpy(&recBuffer, msg, sizeof(MsgT));
00670 
00671 
00672     /* ranging type is @data[0] (attribute) */
00673     switch (msg->data[0])
00674     {
00675         default: /* attribute not known, report error */
00676             {
00677                 return;
00678             }
00679             break;
00680 
00681         case RANGING_TYPE_3W_A : /* use internal memory for A */
00682             {
00683                 /* use internal memory for A */
00684                 prMEM = &rangingMEM;
00685 
00686                 /* copy recieved data into rrv */
00687                 memcpy(prMEM->rrv, msg->data + RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN, RANGING_DATA_LEN);
00688 
00689                 /* it is a ranging start cmd? */
00690                 if (prMEM->rrv[ACTTXID] == 0)
00691                 {
00692                     uint8_t permLen = 0; /* length of user data on permission */
00693 
00694                     /* if function pointer is set, ask upper layer on incoming
00695                      * ranging requests if answer is to perform */
00696                     if (rangingPermission != NULL)
00697                     {
00698                         if ((*rangingPermission)(msg->addr, upMsg.data + RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN + RANGING_DATA_LEN, &permLen) == FALSE)
00699                         {
00700                             RANGING_DEBUG("rx ranging permission NOT granted\n");
00701                             return; /* no answer allowed */
00702                         }
00703                     }
00704 
00705                     /* ranging request, start ranging, start timeout */
00706                     NTRXStartTimeout(RANGING_TIMEOUT);
00707 
00708                     /* its the first packet of a ranging (ranging request) */
00709                     /* => reset local variables and errors */
00710                     //prMEM->errors = STAT_NO_ERROR;
00711                     prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] = RG_STAT_DEFAULT;
00712                     memcpy(prMEM->addr, msg->addr, sizeof(msg->addr));
00713 
00714                     /* set local state to running */
00715                     prMEM->state = RANGING_RUNNING;
00716 
00717                     //memset(prMEM->lrv, 0, 8); /* reset only ranging data */
00718                     //memset(prMEM->rrv, 0, 8); /* reset only ranging data */
00719 
00720                     /* read the rx register (stored in lrv) */
00721                     NTRXReadRegisterRX();
00722 
00723                     /* ranging progresses 0 => 1 */
00724                     prMEM->lrv[ACTTXID] = 1;
00725 
00726 #if 0
00727                     if (permLen > 0)
00728                     {
00729                         /* handle user data */
00730                         if (permLen > CONFIG_MAX_PACKET_SIZE - RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN - RANGING_DATA_LEN)
00731                         {
00732                             RANGING_DEBUG("rx 3W_A - userdata overflow\n");

00751                     upMsg.data[0] = RANGING_TYPE_3W_A;

00753                     memcpy(upMsg.data + RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN, prMEM->lrv, RANGING_DATA_LEN);
00754                     upMsg.len = (uint8_t)(permLen + RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN + RANGING_DATA_LEN);
00755 
00756                     if (upMsg.len > CONFIG_MAX_PACKET_SIZE)
00757                     {
00758                         RANGING_DEBUG("rx 2W_PP - userdata overflow\n");
00759                         error_handler(1);
00760                     }
00761 
00762                     /* attribute is used to identify ranging or datapacket */
00763                     upMsg.attribute = MSG_TYPE_RANGING;
00764 
00765                     /* send ranging packet */
00766                     NTRXSendPacket(&upMsg);
00767 
00768                 }
00769                 else if (prMEM->rrv[ACTTXID] > 0)
00770                 {
00771 
00772                     /* if no ranging is ongoing, abort */
00773                     if (prMEM->state != RANGING_RUNNING) return;
00774 
00775                     /* continue only if its the same address */
00776                     if (memcmp(prMEM->addr, msg->addr, sizeof(msg->addr)) == 0)
00777                     {
00778

00788                                 NTRXSet1();

00791

00795                                 memcpy(rangingMSG.addr, prMEM->addr, sizeof(AddrT));

00797                                 memcpy(upMsg.data, (uint8_t*)&rangingMSG, sizeof(RangingMsgT));
00798                                 upMsg.pdu = upMsg.data;
00799 
00800                                 /* call callbackfuntion to inform the user */
00801                                 upMsg.prim = PD_RANGING_INDICATION;
00802

00804                                 prMEM->state = RANGING_IDLE;
00805

00991     #endif
00992 
00993                 if (prMEM == NULL)
00994                 {
00995                     /* get memory failed, report error to upper layer */
00996                     msg->prim = PD_RANGING_CONFIRM;
00997                     msg->status = PHY_NO_MEMORY;
00998                     memcpy(msg->data, (uint8_t*) &rangingMSG, sizeof(RangingMsgT));
00999                     msg->len = sizeof(rangingMSG);
01000                     msg->pdu = msg->data;
01001                     SendMsgUp (msg);
01002                     return;
01003                 }
01004 
01005                 /* copy recieved data into rrv */
01006                 memcpy(prMEM->rrv, msg->data + RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN, RANGING_DATA_LEN);
01007 
01008 
01009                 if (memcmp(prMEM->addr, msg->addr, sizeof(AddrT)) != 0)
01010                 {
01011                     RANGING_DEBUG("rx 2W_PP - addr changed\n");
01012 
01013                     memcpy(prMEM->addr, msg->addr, sizeof(AddrT));
01014                 }
01015 #if 0
01016                 /* if remote address changed, reset ranging */

01018                     prMEM->lrv[COUNTER] == 0 ||
01019                     prMEM->rrv[COUNTER] == 0)
01020                 {

01022

01025                 }
01026 #endif
01027 
01028                 /* it is a ranging start cmd? */
01029                 if (prMEM->rrv[ACTTXID] == 0)
01030                 {
01031                     /******** ** *******/
01032                     /******** T2 *******/

01043                             return; /* no answer allowed */
01044                         }

01062                         rangingMSG.distance = dist(&prMEM->set1[0],&prMEM->set2[0]);
01063                         rangingMSG.error = (uint8_t)(prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] | prMEM->rrv[RANGING_ERROR]);
01064                         memcpy(rangingMSG.addr, prMEM->addr, sizeof(AddrT));
01065 
01066 #if 0
01067                         /* copy local valus in up message */

01087

01090 
01091                     /* read the rx register (stored in lrv) */
01092                     NTRXReadRegisterRX();
01093 
01094                     /* ranging progresses 0 => 1 */
01095                     prMEM->lrv[ACTTXID] = 1;
01096 
01097                     //prMEM->lrv[COUNTER]++;
01098 
01099                     /* generate first answer packet */
01100                     upMsg.prim = PD_RANGING_REQUEST;
01101                     upMsg.data[0] = RANGING_TYPE_2W_PP;
01102                     memcpy(upMsg.addr, prMEM->addr, sizeof(AddrT));
01103                     memcpy(upMsg.data + RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN, prMEM->lrv, RANGING_DATA_LEN);
01104 
01105 #if 0
01106                     if (permLen > 0)
01107                     {
01108                         /* handle user data */

01110                         {
01111                             RANGING_DEBUG("rx 2W_PP - userdata overflow\n");
01112 
01113                             /* to much user data, return error */
01114                             upMsg.prim = PD_RANGING_CONFIRM;
01115                             upMsg.status = PHY_USER_DATA_OVERFLOW;
01116                             memcpy(upMsg.data, (uint8_t*) &rangingMSG, sizeof(RangingMsgT));
01117                             upMsg.len = sizeof(rangingMSG);
01118                             upMsg.pdu = upMsg.data;
01119                             SendMsgUp (&upMsg);
01120                             return;
01121                         }
01122

01125                     }
01126 #endif
01127 
01128                     upMsg.len = (uint8_t)(permLen + RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN + RANGING_DATA_LEN);
01129 
01130                     if (upMsg.len > CONFIG_MAX_PACKET_SIZE)
01131                     {
01132                         RANGING_DEBUG("rx 2W_PP - userdata overflow\n");
01133                         error_handler(1);
01134                     }
01135 
01136                     /* attribute is used to identify ranging or datapacket */
01137                     upMsg.attribute = MSG_TYPE_RANGING;
01138 
01139                     /* send ranging packet */
01140                     NTRXSendPacket(&upMsg);
01141 
01142 
01143                     /* give ranging result to upper layer */
01144                     memcpy(upMsg.addr, rangingMSG.addr, sizeof(AddrT));
01145                     memcpy(upMsg.data, (uint8_t*)&rangingMSG, sizeof(RangingMsgT));
01146                     upMsg.pdu = upMsg.data;
01147                     /* call callbackfuntion to inform the user */
01148                     upMsg.prim = PD_RANGING_INDICATION;
01149                     /* send up */
01150                     SendMsgUp (&upMsg);
01151 
01152                 }
01153                 else if (prMEM->rrv[ACTTXID] == 1)
01154                 {
01155                     /******** ** *******/
01156                     /******** T4 *******/
01157                     /******** ** *******/
01158 
01159                     /* if no ranging is ongoing, abort */
01160                     if (prMEM->state != RANGING_RUNNING)
01161                     {
01162                         RANGING_DEBUG("rx ERROR - another ranging is running\n");
01163                         return;
01164                     }
01165 
01166                     /* continue only if its the same address */
01167                     if (memcmp(prMEM->addr, msg->addr, sizeof(AddrT)) != 0)
01168                     {
01169                         RANGING_DEBUG("rx ERROR - remote addr changed\n");
01170                         return;
01171                     }
01172 
01173                     NTRXReadRegisterRX();
01174 
01175                     /* ranging done, stop timeout */
01176                     NTRXStopTimeout();
01177 
01178                     /* ranging done, new ranging possible */
01179                     prMEM->state = RANGING_IDLE;
01180 
01181                     /* report successfull ranging to user */
01182                     upMsg.prim = PD_RANGING_INDICATION;
01183                     upMsg.status = PHY_SUCCESS;
01184                     memcpy(upMsg.data, (uint8_t*) &rangingMSG, sizeof(RangingMsgT));
01185                     upMsg.len = sizeof(rangingMSG);
01186                     upMsg.pdu = upMsg.data;
01187                     SendMsgUp (&upMsg);
01188                 }
01189             }
01190             break;
01191     }
01192 
01193     /* check if the last packet contains user data */
01194     if (recBuffer.len > RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN + RANGING_DATA_LEN)
01195     {
01196         /* give only user payload to upper layer */
01197         upMsg.prim = PD_DATA_INDICATION;
01198         memcpy(upMsg.addr, recBuffer.addr, sizeof(AddrT));
01199         upMsg.len = (uint8_t)(recBuffer.len - RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN - RANGING_DATA_LEN);
01200         RANGING_DEBUG("rx - userdata (%d bytes)\n", (uint16_t) upMsg.len);
01201         memcpy(upMsg.data, recBuffer.data + RANGING_PROTOCOL_LEN + RANGING_DATA_LEN, upMsg.len);
01202         upMsg.pdu = upMsg.data;
01203         SendMsgUp(&upMsg);
01204     }
01205 
01206 }
01207 
01208 /**************************************************************************/
01209 void NTRXReadRegisterACK(void)
01210 /**************************************************************************/
01211 {
01212     uint8_t ToaOffsetMeanAckValid;
01213 
01214     /* Read Tx Ranging Registers */
01215     NTRXSPIReadByte (NA_ToaOffsetMeanAckValid_O, &ToaOffsetMeanAckValid);
01216     ToaOffsetMeanAckValid &= (0x01 << NA_ToaOffsetMeanAckValid_B);
01217     ToaOffsetMeanAckValid = (uint8_t)(ToaOffsetMeanAckValid>>NA_ToaOffsetMeanAckValid_B);
01218 
01219     if(ToaOffsetMeanAckValid != 1)
01220     {
01221         RANGING_DEBUG("ERROR ReadRegisterACK\n");/* error */
01222     }
01223     else
01224     {
01225         NTRXSPIReadByte (NA_PhaseOffsetAck_O, &(prMEM->lrv[PHASEOFFSETACK]));
01226         prMEM->lrv[PHASEOFFSETACK] &= (0x07 << NA_PhaseOffsetAck_LSB);
01227         prMEM->lrv[PHASEOFFSETACK] = (uint8_t)(prMEM->lrv[PHASEOFFSETACK]>>NA_PhaseOffsetAck_LSB);
01228 
01229         NTRXSPIRead (NA_ToaOffsetMeanAck_O, &(prMEM->lrv[TOAOFFSETMEANACK_L]), 2);
01230         prMEM->lrv[TOAOFFSETMEANACK_H] &= 0x1f;
01231 
01232         NTRXSPIRead ( NA_TxRespTime_O, &(prMEM->lrv[TXRESPTIME_L]), 2);
01233 
01234         if (prMEM->lrv[ACTTXID] == 0)
01235         {
01236             /* T1 read success */
01237             prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] |= RG_STAT_T1;
01238             //printf("T1\n");
01239         }
01240         else if (prMEM->lrv[ACTTXID] == 1)
01241         {
01242             /* T3 read success */
01243             prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] |= RG_STAT_T3;
01244             //printf("T3\n");
01245         }
01246     }
01247 }
01248 
01249 /**************************************************************************/
01250 double dist(uint8_t *p1, uint8_t *p2)
01251 /**************************************************************************/
01252 {
01253     static double speedofmedium = SPEED_OF_AIR;
01254     double distanceD2R;
01255     double distanceR2D;
01256     double avg = -1.0;
01257 
01258     /* calculate the one way airtime for local station */
01259     distanceD2R = delay(p1);
01260 
01261     /* calculate the distance in [m] for local station */
01262     distanceD2R *=(speedofmedium);
01263 
01264     /* calculate the one way airtime for remote station */
01265     distanceR2D = delay(p2);
01266 
01267     /* calculate the distance in [m] for remote station */
01268     distanceR2D *=(speedofmedium);
01269 
01270     /* the difference between the measurement results from local-
01271     * and remote station should not be to large */
01272     if(distanceR2D>distanceD2R)
01273     {
01274         if((distanceR2D-distanceD2R)>MAX_DIFF_ALLOWED)
01275         {
01276             //prMEM->errors |= STAT_RANGING_VALUE_ERROR;
01277             prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] |= RG_STAT_VALUE_ERROR;
01278         }
01279     }else{
01280         if((distanceD2R-distanceR2D)>MAX_DIFF_ALLOWED)
01281         {
01282             //prMEM->errors |= STAT_RANGING_VALUE_ERROR;
01283             prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] |= RG_STAT_VALUE_ERROR;
01284         }
01285     }
01286 
01287     avg  = ((distanceD2R + distanceR2D )/2.0); /* [m] */
01288 
01289     return avg;
01290 }
01291 
01292 #define CLK_4MHZ 4
01293 #define CLK_32MHZ 32
01294 #define CLK_LOD20 (2000.0/244175)
01295 #define PULSE_DET_UC_MAX (2*24)
01296 
01297 /**************************************************************************/
01298 double delay(uint8_t *p)
01299 /**************************************************************************/
01300 {
01301     /* clock period [MHz] */
01302     //const uint8_t clk_4MHz  = 4;
01303     //const uint8_t clk_32MHz = 32;
01304     /* Scaled 1:20 divider's clock period [MHz] */
01305     //const double clk_lod20 = (2000.0/244175);
01306 
01307     //const uint16_t PulseDetUcMax = 5;
01308     //const uint16_t PulseDetUcMax_table[16] = {1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 24, 32, 40, 48, 56, 64, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1};
01309     //const uint8_t PulseDetUcMax_table = 24;
01310 
01311     double res;
01312 
01313     uint32_t TxRespTime = (p[TXRESPTIME_H]        << 8) | (p[TXRESPTIME_L]);
01314     int32_t  RxUcSum    = (p[TOAOFFSETMEANACK_H]  << 8) | (p[TOAOFFSETMEANACK_L]);
01315     int32_t  TxUcSum    = (p[TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_H] << 8) | (p[TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_L]);
01316 
01317     int32_t  RxGateOff  = p[PHASEOFFSETACK]  == 7 ? 7 : 6 - p[PHASEOFFSETACK];
01318     int32_t  TxGateOff  = p[PHASEOFFSETDATA] == 7 ? 7 : 6 - p[PHASEOFFSETDATA];
01319 
01320     double rangingConst = (modeSet.fec) ? modeSet.rangingConst_FECon : modeSet.rangingConst_FECoff;
01321 
01322 //  printf("%ld:%ld:%ld:%ld:%ld::", TxRespTime, RxUcSum, TxUcSum, RxGateOff, TxGateOff);
01323 
01324     if (modeSet.fdma == 0)
01325     {
01326         res = ((TxRespTime)/(double)CLK_4MHZ
01327                 - ((TxGateOff+RxGateOff))/(double)CLK_32MHZ
01328             - (TxUcSum+RxUcSum)*CLK_LOD20/PULSE_DET_UC_MAX)/2.0
01329             - rangingConst;
01330     }else{
01331         res = (TxRespTime/(double)CLK_4MHZ - (TxGateOff+RxGateOff)/(double)CLK_32MHZ
01332             -(TxUcSum+RxUcSum)/CLK_32MHZ*PULSE_DET_UC_MAX)/2.0
01333             - rangingConst;
01334     }
01335 
01336     return res;
01337 }
01338 
01339 /**************************************************************************/
01340 void NTRXSet0(void)
01341 /**************************************************************************/
01342 {
01343     /* combine data for locally initiated round trip */
01344     prMEM->set1[PHASEOFFSETACK]=prMEM->lrv[PHASEOFFSETACK];
01345     prMEM->set1[TOAOFFSETMEANACK_H]=prMEM->lrv[TOAOFFSETMEANACK_H];
01346     prMEM->set1[TOAOFFSETMEANACK_L]=prMEM->lrv[TOAOFFSETMEANACK_L];
01347     prMEM->set1[TXRESPTIME_H]=prMEM->lrv[TXRESPTIME_H];
01348     prMEM->set1[TXRESPTIME_L]=prMEM->lrv[TXRESPTIME_L];
01349 
01350     prMEM->set1[PHASEOFFSETDATA]=prMEM->rrv[PHASEOFFSETDATA];
01351     prMEM->set1[TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_H]=prMEM->rrv[TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_H];
01352     prMEM->set1[TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_L]=prMEM->rrv[TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_L];
01353 
01354 #if 0
01355     printf("%d:%d:%d:%d:%d:",prMEM->set1[PHASEOFFSETACK],
01356                             prMEM->set1[TOAOFFSETMEANACK_H] << 8 | prMEM->set1[TOAOFFSETMEANACK_L],
01357                             prMEM->set1[TXRESPTIME_H] << 8 | prMEM->set2[TXRESPTIME_L],
01358                             prMEM->set1[PHASEOFFSETDATA],
01359                             prMEM->set1[TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_H] << 8 | prMEM->set1[TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_L]
01360                             );
01361 #endif
01362 }
01363 
01364 /**************************************************************************/
01365 void NTRXSet1(void)
01366 /**************************************************************************/
01367 {
01368     /* combine data for remotely initiated round trip */
01369     prMEM->set2[PHASEOFFSETACK]=prMEM->rrv[PHASEOFFSETACK];
01370     prMEM->set2[TOAOFFSETMEANACK_H]=prMEM->rrv[TOAOFFSETMEANACK_H];
01371     prMEM->set2[TOAOFFSETMEANACK_L]=prMEM->rrv[TOAOFFSETMEANACK_L];
01372     prMEM->set2[TXRESPTIME_H]=prMEM->rrv[TXRESPTIME_H];
01373     prMEM->set2[TXRESPTIME_L]=prMEM->rrv[TXRESPTIME_L];
01374 
01375     prMEM->set2[PHASEOFFSETDATA]=prMEM->lrv[PHASEOFFSETDATA];
01376     prMEM->set2[TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_H]=prMEM->lrv[TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_H];
01377     prMEM->set2[TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_L]=prMEM->lrv[TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_L];
01378 
01379 #if 0
01380     printf("%d:%d:%d:%d:%d:",prMEM->set2[PHASEOFFSETACK],
01381                             prMEM->set2[TOAOFFSETMEANACK_H] << 8 | prMEM->set2[TOAOFFSETMEANACK_L],
01382                             prMEM->set2[TXRESPTIME_H] << 8 | prMEM->set2[TXRESPTIME_L],
01383                             prMEM->set2[PHASEOFFSETDATA],
01384                             prMEM->set2[TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_H] << 8 | prMEM->set2[TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_L]
01385                             );
01386 #endif
01387 }
01388 
01389 /**************************************************************************/
01390 void NTRXReadRegisterRX(void)
01391 /**************************************************************************/
01392 {
01393     uint8_t ToaOffsetMeanDataValid;
01394 
01395     /* Read Rx Ranging Registers */
01396     NTRXSPIReadByte (NA_ToaOffsetMeanDataValid_O, &ToaOffsetMeanDataValid);
01397     ToaOffsetMeanDataValid &= (0x01 << NA_ToaOffsetMeanDataValid_B);
01398     ToaOffsetMeanDataValid = (uint8_t)(ToaOffsetMeanDataValid>>NA_ToaOffsetMeanDataValid_B);
01399 
01400 
01401     if(ToaOffsetMeanDataValid != 1)
01402     {
01403         RANGING_DEBUG("ERROR ReadRegisterRX\n");/* error */
01404     }
01405     else
01406     {
01407         NTRXSPIReadByte (NA_PhaseOffsetData_O, &(prMEM->lrv[PHASEOFFSETDATA]));
01408         prMEM->lrv[PHASEOFFSETDATA] &= (0x07 << NA_PhaseOffsetData_LSB);
01409         prMEM->lrv[PHASEOFFSETDATA] = (uint8_t)(prMEM->lrv[PHASEOFFSETDATA] >> NA_PhaseOffsetData_LSB);
01410 
01411         NTRXSPIRead (NA_ToaOffsetMeanData_O, &(prMEM->lrv[TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_L]), 2);
01412         prMEM->lrv[TOAOFFSETMEANDATA_H] &= 0x1f;
01413 
01414         if (prMEM->rrv[ACTTXID] == 0)
01415         {
01416             /* T2 read success */
01417             prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] |= RG_STAT_T2;
01418             //printf("T2\n");
01419         }
01420         else if (prMEM->rrv[ACTTXID] == 1)
01421         {
01422             /* T4 read success */
01423             prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] |= RG_STAT_T4;
01424             //printf("T4\n");
01425         }
01426 
01427     }
01428 
01429 
01430 }
01431 
01432 /** @brief structure for all layer configuration settings  */
01433 extern PhyPIB phyPIB;
01434 /**************************************************************************/
01435 void NTRXStartTimeout(uint16_t to_ms)
01436 /**************************************************************************/
01437 {
01438     to_stop = FALSE;
01439 
01440     if (phyPIB.CAMode != PHY_CCA_OFF) to_ms += TO_CSMA;
01441 
01442     if (to_ms > 20)
01443     {
01444         to_cnt_down = to_ms / 20;
01445         to_mod = to_ms % 20;
01446         NTRXStartBbTimer(20*1000);
01447     }
01448     else
01449     {
01450         to_cnt_down = 0;
01451         to_mod = 0;
01452         NTRXStartBbTimer(to_ms*1000);
01453     }
01454 }
01455 
01456 /**************************************************************************/
01457 void NTRXStopTimeout(void)
01458 /**************************************************************************/
01459 {
01460     to_stop = TRUE;
01461 }
01462 
01463 /**************************************************************************/
01464 void NTRXRangingInterrupt(void)
01465 /**************************************************************************/
01466 {
01467 
01468     if (to_stop == TRUE)
01469     {
01470         //RANGING_DEBUG("interr - to abort\n");
01471         return;
01472     }
01473 
01474     //RANGING_DEBUG("interr - cnt %d, mod %d\n", to_cnt_down, to_mod);
01475 
01476     if (to_cnt_down > 0)
01477     {
01478         NTRXStartBbTimer(20*1000);
01479         to_cnt_down--;
01480     }
01481     else
01482     {
01483         if (to_mod > 0)
01484         {
01485             NTRXStartBbTimer(to_mod*1000);
01486             to_mod = 0;
01487         }
01488         else
01489         {
01490             /* timeout! */
01491             RANGING_DEBUG("interr - timeout\n");
01492 
01493             //prMEM->errors |= STAT_TIMEOUT;
01494             prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] |= RG_STAT_TIMEOUT;
01495 
01496             /* copy local valus in up message */
01497             rangingMSG.error = (uint8_t)(prMEM->lrv[RANGING_ERROR] | prMEM->rrv[RANGING_ERROR]);
01498             RANGING_DEBUG("interr, indication, 0x%02X\n", (uint16_t) rangingMSG.error);
01499             rangingMSG.distance = -1.0;
01500             memcpy(rangingMSG.addr, prMEM->addr, sizeof(AddrT));
01501             memcpy(upMsg.addr, prMEM->addr, sizeof(AddrT));
01502             memcpy(upMsg.data, (uint8_t*)&rangingMSG, sizeof(RangingMsgT));
01503             upMsg.pdu = upMsg.data;
01504 
01505             /* call callbackfuntion to inform the user */
01506             upMsg.prim = PD_RANGING_INDICATION;
01507 
01508             /* ranging done, new ranging possible */
01509             prMEM->state = RANGING_IDLE;
01510 
01511             /* send up */
01512             SendMsgUp (&upMsg);
01513         }
01514     }
01515 }
01516 
01517 /**************************************************************************/
01518 void RangingRegisterCallback(permissionfn_t rgPermission, mem_assignfn_t rgGetMemory)
01519 /**************************************************************************/
01520 {
01521     rangingPermission = rgPermission;
01522     rangingGetMemory = rgGetMemory;
01523 }
